attributes.action: HM Revenue and Customs purposely delaying VAT refunds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HM Revenue and Customs is using excessive powers to make certain and drive legitimate UK Tax paying businesses into insolvency indefinetly by with holding UK businesses Input tax credit(VAT refunds) for a year and more.

HM Revenue and Customs are attacking honest tax paying businesses by distrupting trade and jeopardizing its financies.

HM Revenue and Customs are passing its losses on to innocent taxpayers. The goverment cannot pass its losses on innocent businesses who have respected and followed guidelines created by HM Revenue and Customs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
